item.title: Couples Inventory
item.description: Every once in a while Kat and I do a “Couples Inventory”. Just a list of questions we ask, to make sure we’re addressing the things we need to be addressing. Kat proposed we start doing this shortly after we became parents, and I think it’s been really helpful. Here’s an edited version of that list:
